head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EBB, LAWRENCE FORREST

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EBB, LAWRENCE FORREST

block.p: EBB-Lawrence Forrest. Of Washington, DC. On Friday, August 4, 2000, at the National Rehabilitation Hospital. Beloved husband of Kim Ebb and father of Nancy, David, and Peter Ebb. Devoted father-inlaw of Gary Ford, Winnie Ebb, and Frances Green. Loving grandfather of Mike and Dan Ford and Sam, Max, Joe, and Sara Ebb. Private inurnment. There will be a memorial service in September. Memorial contributions may be made to the Boston Latin School Association, 41 West Street, 6th flr, Boston, MA 02111. The family thanks Dr. Simlote and the staff of the National Rehabilitation Hospital for their thoughtful care and support.
